hints.content:
The bar for Sun City lines up with the $\greenD{200}$ on the scale. The bar for Shiny Town lines up with $\purpleD{275}$ on the scale.  


[[☃ image 1]]

Which town had more than $\greenD{200}$ sunny days, but fewer than $\purpleD{275}$ sunny days?

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of Sunny Days and the vertical axis labeled Place. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 50, 100, 150, 200, 250, and 300. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Sun City, Shiny Town, Bright Village, and Light Land. The bar line for each place shows the following: Sun City bar line extends to 200, Shiny Town bar line extends to the middle of 250 and 300, Bright Village bar line extends to 250, and Light Land bar line extends to 150. A green line labeled 200 is drawn up from 200, which reaches to the end of Sun City bar line. A purple line labeled 275 is drawn up from between 250 and 300, which reaches to the end of Shiny Town bar line. !

hints.content:
[[☃ image 1]]

Bright Village had $\redD{250}$ sunny days in $2013$.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of Sunny Days and the vertical axis labeled Place. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 50, 100, 150, 200, 250, and 300. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Sun City, Shiny Town, Bright Village, and Light Land. The bar line for each place shows the following: Sun City bar line extends to 200, Shiny Town bar line extends to the middle of 250 and 300, Bright Village bar line extends to 250, and Light Land bar line extends to 150. A red line labeled 250 is drawn up from 250, which reaches to the end of Bright Village bar line. !

hints.content: $\redD{\text{Bright Village}}$ had more sunny days in $2013$ than Sun City had, but fewer than the town with the most sunny days.

question.content:
Enzo counted the number of sunny days each of his favorite towns had in the year $2013$ and graphed the results.


[[☃ image 1]]

**Which town had more sunny days in $2013$ than Sun City had, but fewer than the town with the most sunny days?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of Sunny Days and the vertical axis labeled Place. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 50, 100, 150, 200, 250, and 300. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Sun City, Shiny Town, Bright Village, and Light Land. The bar line for each place shows the following: Sun City bar line extends to 200, Shiny Town bar line extends to the middle of 250 and 300, Bright Village bar line extends to 250, and Light Land bar line extends to 150. !
